segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying that plate like nothing is wrong at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that stool if he stretches any further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, her hand out like she’s expecting a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware everyone is right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the floor if it keeps going like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are going to get in so much trouble if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
